plays.text: Penalty to Bill Houlder 2 minutes for Holding the Stick Keith Primeau
Goal scored by Jiri Dopita assisted by Donald Brashear and Chris McAllister
Goal scored by Cliff Ronning assisted by Greg Johnson
Goal scored by Simon Gagne assisted by Mark Recchi and Jeremy Roenick
Penalty to David Legwand 2 minutes for Obstruction - Hooking Keith Primeau
Penalty to Kimmo Timonen 2 minutes for Holding the Stick Simon Gagne
Goal scored by Cliff Ronning assisted by David Legwand and Scott Hartnell
Penalty to Scott Hartnell 2 minutes for Roughing Kim Johnsson
Penalty to Kim Johnsson 2 minutes for Elbowing Scott Hartnell served by Donald Brashear
Penalty to Kim Johnsson 2 minutes for Roughing Scott Hartnell
Goal scored by Denis Arkhipov assisted by Vladimir Orszagh and Mark Eaton
